paragraph.heading: 2Compiling

list.item: Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK.
Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file.

paragraph.heading: 2Running
paragraph.paragraph: After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above. Modifying the values of the spin buttons will alter the position of the pixmapped button, relative to the viewport in which it is contained.
paragraph.heading: 2Under the Hood
paragraph.paragraph: The features set_x_offset and set_y_offset are used to modify the position of the EV_VIEWPORT relative to the EV_BUTTON contained within.

This sample contains the following class:
VIEWPORT
